评论详情: These barefoot are amazing I take them hiking.They are super lightweight, very functional and amazing part of these shoes when hiking doesn’t slip . Super easy to clean, I just put them in the washer gentle clean they stay looking amazing as if I never went hiking.I really love the color I choose was camouflage. They are true to size I usually fit in a size 6 and I picked 5.5-6 and it fit perfect no need to size down or size up.

I see a lot of brands claim to be barefoot shoes but are really only wide tie box. The soles should also fold like these. These are super comfy and affordable. I actually prefer them without socks. Excited to try these out at the gym
These minimalist shoes have been comfortable.  However, I had to return for the next largest size, so I recommend keeping that in mind when you order.  There was no problem with the return, though.

I mostly wear these while doing yard work but decided to try them on a steep hiking trail. They were AMAZING! I have a top line hiking shoe I normally wear but opted for these because of how lightweight they are. Their grip - INCREDIBLE - climbing and down smooth rock and these held me in place. I could feel every rock I stepped on but easy fix by adding some gel ortho inserts. Otherwise, an amazingly comfortable hiking shoe. Buying another pair so I am never without.

I do not like to feel like I am wearing heels when I am hiking, running or walking. I wore holes in the bottoms of my last pair and was so happy to see they are still available. I like to wear them when exercising as well.

评论概述: Nice wide toe but no arch support
评论详情: It is hard to get wide toes and these are really comfortable but I needed to add an arch support. For older people whose arches are a bit collapsed, heads up. Buy to allow room for this. I went one size up and that works.

评论概述: I wanted to love these but
评论详情: I really liked how they felt and looked EXCEPT for the extremely tight band around the top ankle opening. I had to return and order something else. And no, I don't have large ankles or feet so not sure what was going on with these.

评论概述: My wife is pleased with these shoes
评论详情: Very comfortable, snug. These do run a little small - she shared with me. She ordered a 1/2 size up.
Nice

This is my first pair of barefoot type shoes. So far, I really like these shoes. They're made of a stretchy type mesh/ cotton, except where the laces connect, and that area is like a hard plastic? They seem slick on wet vinyl floor, but most of my shoes are.  It hasn't been wet outside yet to check other surfaces. They fit like a glove on my foot. I have a wide foot, so they are snug, but don't feel tight at all, very stretchy and comfy. I've even put on heavy socks and they still fit nice. I like the look of them too. I will buy more of these!
Like the fit but not sure why they came with velcro. The pic does not show any velcro.

These were my first barefoot shoes and initially I really liked them for their wide toe box. The top is a little tight on my foot but I was able to overlook that for the reasonable price and great width of the shoe. After a week or so, I realized the insole still has a bit of uneven padding so I removed it to create what I hoped would be a true barefoot experience. Unfortunately the sole of these shoes has many treads that can be felt on the foot when walking for longer distances. I used them on the treadmill, walking only, last week and got blisters on the bottom of my feet where the ball of the foot was consistently pressing on one of the lumps of the treads. If the soles were flat this would not be an issue, or if the insole has been flat and not needed to be removed, perhaps it would have absorbed some of the unevenness of the sole, but as it’s currently designed, this is not a true barefoot shoe.
Love these shoes, and shockingly get many compliments on them and they are super comfortable.
Like being bear foot.
Fit well good support

评论概述: Not the worst shoes ever, could be much better
评论详情: Toes are much wider than images appear. Elastic band around the top goes much higher than shown and is tight. They do have good traction for walking.
Not comfortable!

I love my Joomra shoes.  When I read the reviews, some people said they were difficult to put on.  But I have a narrow foot so for me it is real easy.  I am thinking if you have extra wide feet, this model may be a little difficult.  They are lightweight, stretchy, great traction, and support.  I wasn't sure what to expect because I never had a minimalistic shoe, but they really feels good to walk in them.I am going to have to get another pair.

评论概述: Great shoes when you use your toes to grip
评论详情: Mine are almost 3 years old, and have never worn out. I use them for hiking, working, and running. They are easily the best shoes for my feet that I have ever bought. I have narrow feet and long toes, and tend to grip with my toes. The grip and flexibility is excellent. I'm only ordering a new pair bc an insole was chewed by a dog! If you grip with your toes and enjoy the freedom and grip of walking barefoot, then I highly recommend them! If you are someone requiring a bunch of support or walk flatly, then they probably won't be for you. These are the best shoes I've ever owned for my type of feet.

None structure of my feet make fitting comfortably difficult. These shoes, with large toe box and zero drop fit are perfect. They provide feedback for the whole foot. Can’t speak to longevity, or warmth. Had to buy a size bigger than I thought.  I would buy them again.
I love these shoes, they are so comfortable. They're almost better than barefoot. Buy a half size smaller than you normally wear.
I really do not like to wear shoes and stay barefoot while home. However, I will keep these on around the house. Very comfortable for walking and every day wear. Can see me getting another pair.

Got these shoes yesterday, walked the dog on cement and off…SO happy, my feet feel free, not pinched or numbish. Wore light ankle socks.  I am a very active 72 year old and these are the best shoes my feet have ever been in, rank right up there with complete freedom flip flops. Big toe box shoes forever! Thank you! Wear a 9, bought a 9W, perfect!
Very comfortable.  I could wear them every day.

评论概述: Maybe not for thick feet/wide ankles
评论详情: The listing for this barefoot trail running shoe has multiple style versions. As pictured, I tried one that has rows of elastic at the foot opening and one without. My thick/wide feet fit fine in Birkenstock clogs (my usual footwear) and fit fine in the wider opening of the Joomra style on the right/red shoe), but the narrower opening of the elastic-bound (left/black) shoe was snug to the point of uncomfortable. The rows of elastic also rolled into the shoe as I was putting it on. Both styles have wide toe boxes and are comfortable around the foot, but the rows of elastic style may not work depending on your foot volume/ankle width.

评论用户: I think that it is very awesome
评论详情: A little harsh to get on. They are very tight
Very comfortable! Great walking shoes but I purchased these in May and feel like they should have held up longer.

Second time I buy this brand. I use them primarily for just walking to work and at work. The first pair lasted maybe 4yrs or 5yrs. Would used them for about 6-8 hours a day on tile, and carpet flooring. Sometimes on dirt and on streets too. The bottom rubber stayed intact but had to toss them because the fabric gave out. It's usually the soles that give out first. I really love these shoes and bran. They are pretty comfy but did try different inserts to better accommodate my feet. UPDATE I did end up buying different inserts because the ones that came with the shoes became pretty painful after a few minutes of walking. Couldn't get my feet to adjust. Other than that I would still say 5 stars.

I would return them but I did get one shoe on and walked around hoping it would stretch or something but to no avail. Even took the shoe laces out. I wanted to love these shoes. The black and just flecks of gray is such a good combination so you could wear them with just about anything. I own 2 pair of these one for inside one for outside. They are my everyday shoe. The traction is great, durable and machine washable, the material is thick enough to protect and breath. They are so versatile I wear them everywhere.

They are comfortable to wear. I can wear 9.5 US women’s, but I decided to go with a 10. It fit as expected. I walk/hike most days and it feels good. I can feel some of the larger crushed stones when I walk on them, but I guess the point is to feel barefoot. It doesn’t hurt.

Fits great and very comfortable.  Lightweight and very cool.
I fell in love with these the moment I put them on.  They are just like the advertisement.  I really like the way they feel on my feet.  I will order another pair, but in a different color.

I love these shoes, they are comfortable and look great, but they are so hard to get on. The top where you put your feet in are shaped like a snug slipper. I bought these specifically for exercising because they had thin soles, very bendable, and room for your toes to spread out so they don’t get cramped. But dang are they hard to get over your heel. Otherwise I would have given them a 5 star. Perhaps they will stretch out over time. Maybe I was suppose to wear them without socks, like water shoes. But my feet sweat so I’d rather have socks on. I think I got mine in Dark grey.. it looks like a heather which I like. The toe box is wide and comfortable The opening around the ankle is too high on my ankle bone and tight for me

评论概述: I rarely write reviews, but this deserves it!!
评论详情: I am not a review leaver.. I am a review user though! And I saw a lot of positive feedback about these and decided to try them.. these are the most comfortable shoes! Zero break in time, usually I’ll get a blister from new shoes but these were perfect, no blisters or wear and tear at all. I used these on a hike, then took off my socks and used them as water shoes, and running shoes! They are so versatile and comfortable I honestly think I’ll buy a couple more pairs!

My problem is my big toes. The outside top corner on each of them is extremely sensitive. Therefore, I don't need them to bump up against the hardest part of the shoe, which they are. The fit is good except for the toe box. I have very narrow feet so I thought with a wider toe box I'd be ok. Not ok. I'm lucky if I can go a mile in these shoes. They may be perfect except for my issue. If there is anyone else out there with sensitive toes, these may not be what you're looking for. I use them for a quick jaunt up to my chicken coop and that's about it.

These are good looking shoes that fit nicely and feel fine while wearing. They are super grippy. However, it is painful to walk in them. It feels like I am walking on gravel. So far I have only worn them in the house over the past 24 hours. It is more comfortable to walk barefoot or in my house slippers or even flip flops than to walk in these. I really want to love these but I don't think I can bare to wear them for a week on vacation, hiking and wading. I placed a penny to show off the tread.

These barefoot shoes are great for walking and accommodate socks or no socks. The hold up well to multiple miles a day.  The sides are breathable making it so I don't have to worry about stinky shoes when I don't wear socks.
best shoes ever !! literally the most comfortable!! they were just a little big so maybe order .5 down! best decision for my hiking trip!!

I love these, they have been helping my feet and are sooooo much more comfortable than regular tennis shoes. I wear them to work (custodian) and I do lots of walking, they are holding up great! Easy to clean and very breathable. My foot pain has practically disappeared since I got these. They're a little bit to get used to look and feel wise but I love them and have had people ask me about them too. I wouldn't say they're 100% waterproof but they do a decent job. If you're on the fence just buy them already even just to try them out! The only issue I have with them is that they're just slightly tight at the rubber band that the laces go into. Would like to buy more expensive barefoot shoes but these work great for now! Don’t expect them to be cushioned normal shoes. They are barefoot shoes for a reason but are good ones at that. :)

Feels very stable on my foot and provides ample cushion without being too tight.  I wore them to the pool but did not go I. They fit like a glove and I have not had any issues so far.
